title: Our children : Video package
creator_credit: Seven Dimensions, Film Victoria and Rachel Dixon
brief_description: A Child Protection Package to train professionals who are in regular contact with children. Divided into 5 segments: 1: Defining abuse 2:Difficulties in reporting 3:Early detection and support 4:Networking for information exchange and case management 5:On-going responsibility for prevention, protection and support between family, CSV and professionals. Accompanied by 43p. Leader’s Guide including 8 overhead transparencies. The Leader’s Guide should be used in conjunction with the video. It gives background information as well as discussion questions and issues relevant to each segment.
